title: PowerShell PSReadLine crashes with long commands
description: The PowerShell terminal is repeatedly crashing with a System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in PSReadLine when executing long commands. This disrupts the workflow and requires re-running commands.
comment: Permanently fixed the PSReadLine crash in the Cursor terminal by adding conditional logic to the PowerShell profile (C:\Users\edwar\Documents\PowerShell\Microsoft.PowerShell_profile.ps1) to prevent the module from loading when inside the IDE's terminal (where TERM_PROGRAM equals 'vscode').
